jd: Hello My name is Digvijay singh and I am a Staffing Specialist at Spear Staffing. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Job Description: Production Support Specialist (3 openings)Client: DTCCLocation: Tampa (Hybrid)Contract: To Hire after 6 monthsNo. of position: 3Visa: No H1bs or OPT Interview Process:2 rounds of in-person interviews. Experience Required:Minimum 7 years of experience in application support.Title can be Lead Application Support Engineer or Specialist/ Production Support Specialist.Experience supporting systems with containers or Kubernetes and cloud technologies is preferred, not only exposure.Middleware experience is preferred; familiarity with MQ middleware is a plus.Knowledge of distributed development systems.Lead, train and support the production support team, providing technical guidance and expertise.------------------------------------------------------------------------Production Support Specialist- LeadYears Experience: 5+ YearsCore skill experience in Java/J2EE, Unix, Linux, WindowsExperience on Cloud Technologies (AWS services (S3,EC2,Lambda,SQS,IAM roles), Azure, OpenShift, RDS Aurora, Postgress)Experience on Middleware experience (Solace, Tomcat, Liberty Server, WebSphere, WebLogic, JBoss)Familiarity working with relational databases (DB2, Oracle, Snowflake) and PL/SQLExposure to Messaging Queue Systems (IBM MQ, Oracle AQ, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, Kafka)Knowledge Monitoring and Data Tools experience (Splunk, DynaTrace, Thousand Eyes, Grafana, Selenium,HiPam IBM Zolda)knowledge of Scripting languages (Bash, Python, Ruby, Shell, Perl, JavaScript)Exposure to Mainframe troubleshooting and support skills (COBOL, JCL, DB2, DB2 Stored Procedures, CICS, SPUFI, File aid) - PreferredExposure to Mainframe scheduling (Job abends, Predecessor/Successor) - - Preferred Should you be interested, please send me a copy of your resume in word format along with the following details ASAP. Full Name:Current Location:Hourly rate on C2C/W2:Work Authorization:Earliest Available date to start:Date and times available to interview:Two Professional References:(Preferably Supervisory references): Thanks and regardsDigvijay SinghSr Technical Recruiter Email:- Digvijay@spearstaffing.comWebsite:- www.spearstaffing.com
